author: Michael Salfino
title: Bryce Harper Hits a Run of Bad Luck
text:
Bryce Harper is one of the most feared hitters in baseball, so it isn’t a surprise that he’s one of the major-league leaders in on-base percentage with a .410 average, entering Wednesday’s play.
But catch a glimpse of his batting average when he steps up to the plate and the number is shocking: the Nationals star is hitting a career low .230.
Since...
